resources.string: Oops, something went wrong while setting up the app. Please try again later.
The treatment has finished. Please modify the end date to proceed with this treatment.
The email must contain between 5 and 50 characters.
The email is invalid. Please enter a valid email.
Sorry, no account found with this email address. Please try again.
Sorry, no account found with this email address. Please try again or create a new account.
Sorry, this email address is already in use. Please use a different one.
The password must contain between 8 and 60 characters.
Incorrect password. Please try again.
The passwords don´t match.
The first name mustn´t be empty.
The last name mustn´t be empty.
The title mustn´t be empty.
The start date mustn´t be empty.
The start date mustn´t be after other dates contained in the treatment.
The end date must be after the start date.
The end date mustn´t be before other dates contained in the treatment.
The title must contain less than 200 characters.
The name mustn´t be empty.
The specified medicine already exists in this treatment.
The initial dosing time mustn´t be empty.
The previous notification time must be less than the dosage frequency.
The description mustn`t be empty.
The medicine has no more doses. Please, modify its dosing frequency or the treatment end date to continue with this medicine.
Please enable location to use this feature.
